endpoints.description: Get cryptocurrency price data. Accepts optional 'symbol' parameter (e.g., BTC, ETH, SOL). Defaults to BTC if not provided.

_comment: Endpoint-specific API keys: Add 'api_keys' field to any endpoint to override global keys. Value can be comma-separated keys or a path to a .txt file with one key per line. Example: 'api_keys': 'key1,key2,key3' or 'api_keys': 'config/api_keys.txt'
